price: 17. Jie mažai miegojo naktimis (melsdamiesi savo Viešpačiui).
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
